bibl.title: Letter from William T. Davis to Emilie Lawrence Reed, December 22, 1934

div1.p: Davis sends Christmas wishes to Emilie Reed and requests a photograph of her.

div1.head: Letter from William T. Davis to Emilie Lawrence Reed, December 22, 1934
div1.opener:
WM. THORNWALL DAVIS, M. D.
ERNEST SHEPPARD, M. D.
927 SEVENTEENTH STREET N. W.
(FARRAGUT SQUARE)
TELEPHONE METROPOLITAN 0703
HOURS BY APPOINTMENT
WASHINGTON, D. C.
December 22, 1934
Dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
I wonder if I may ask you for a photograph
of your sweet self? So many years since I first
came to love Major Reed and you and Blossom. It
would be a warming of my heart to have such a
photograph.
Thank you for your sweet Christmas card.
May you and Blossom have a happy Christmas.
div1.closer:
Faithfully yours, Wm. T. Davis Mrs. Walter Reed
Burlington Hotel
City
WTD:U
